guide.title: Gather your friends
guide.description: Game is most fun when playing with friends 🎮

guide.title: add categories
guide.description: Each player adds two unique categories. A new category is added in each odd round

guide.title: The chosen one
guide.description: Every round a letter is chosen at random 🔤

guide.title: A for Apple
guide.description: Write 1-2 word(s) for each category that start with the chosen letter ✍️

guide.title: Score your "friends"
guide.description: 10 points for an unique answer, 5 for duplicates and 🥚 for no answer

guide.title: The Winner
guide.description: Player with the highest score after the last round wins 🏆
